input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product specification information.

Product specification:
ProSticker 306 (One) 4" Patriot Series Thank You Blue Who Protect and Serve Thin Blue Line Support Decal Sticker

Product keywords:
Indoor/Outdoor decals 
Made with outdoor professional grade vinyl and UV resistant inks.
Contoured cut to the shape of the image for a clean and custom look.
Uniquely designed by our national award winning artist to look good on any colored background.
Can be applied to most smooth surfaces including vehicles, laptops, windows, tool boxes, etc.
Instructions included for easy application. All orders ship the same or next business day.
Bulk Quantities and Custom Orders are our specialty.
 Be assured all of our sales are "Square & on the Level" Your satisfaction is guaranteed.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Introducing the G.I. JOE Real American Hero car bumper sticker - the perfect way to show off your love for your favorite military action figures and adventure series! Measuring in at 8" x 2", this die-cut sticker is made from high-quality, all-weather outdoor grade vinyl that is UV and water resistant. You can rest assured that this sticker will look great and last for years to come, no matter the conditions. And with easy application and removal, you can stick it anywhere - car bumper, window, locker, binder, wall, wood, metal - the possibilities are endless. So, whether you're a die-hard G.I. JOE fan or just looking for a fun way to decorate your space, this sticker is a perfect choice!
input_text.Response B: The ProSticker 306 (One) 4" Patriot Series Thank You Blue Who Protect and Serve Thin Blue Line Support Decal Sticker is a unique and affordable way to support our men and women in blue. Our decals are professionally printed with outdoor professional-grade vinyl and UV resistant inks. These contour cut decals have been designed by our national award-winning artist to look good on any colored background. They can be applied to most smooth surfaces including vehicles, laptops, windows, tool boxes, etc. The instructions are included for easy application. All orders ship the same or next business day.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
